title: Projected total revenue of Amazon 2002 to 2022
yAxis: Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In general Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 2002 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2005, rapidly increasing from 2005 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2020.
The highest Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 276.0 was reached at Year 2020
The lowest Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 4.0 was reported at Year 2002
